DUE A



DUE S
   
Faema Due: The machine that suits every need. Its modern design and compact dimensions allow installation almost anywhere. It is easy to use and maintenance is a minimum. A large capacity boiler maintains a high production of hot water and steam ensuring consistent quality coffee.
 
Specifications
  • automatic espresso coffee machine with programmable volumetric portion control (Due A)
  • semi-automatic espresso coffee machine (Due S)
  • Cappuccino Magic included
  • 2 additional steam spouts and 1 hot water spout
  • coffee brewing by means of programmable touch buttons (Due A)
  • coffee brewing by means of an on/off switch (Due S)
  • electronic water level control
  • built-in volumetric pump and external water softner
  • dual pump and boiler pressure gauge
  • available in 1, 2 & 3 group versions
  • makrolon outer case and stainless steel frame
  • colour: grey or burgundy
 
TECHNICAL DATA
DUE A & S 1 group 2 groups 3 groups
Boiler capacity (liters) 8 11 17.5
Voltage 208/220V, 60 Hz
Absorption 2800W 3800W 5300W
